name: OVERTAKE (itch)
description:
your a virus trying to escape the lab you can over take creatures to use them to escape

this game has been made for the geojam

i didnt say this in the game but you can press escape to go to the menu and R to restart

there are 2 Easter eggs they aren't that hard to find to be honest
